original_title: Anamaria: A Mulher de Branco de Ipanema
overview: Anamaria de Carvalho is part of Rio's urban culture and has become a symbol of one of the most famous neighborhoods in the world. Nothing is more coherent than showing the premiere of the documentary at the Oi Futuro cultural center, also in Ipanema, a reference in music and audiovisual", says Maria Arlete Gon√ßalves, director of Culture at Oi Futuro.
title: Anamaria: A Mulher de Branco de Ipanema
